mapper.select:
select a.id id, a.title title, a.summary summary, a.editor_type editorType, a.path path, (select group_concat(c.name separator ' ') from category c where c.id in(select d.category_id from category_content d where d.content_id = a.id)) categoryNames, a.author author, a.source source, a.sort sort, a.out_link outLink, a.comment comment, a.page page, a.keywords keywords, a.description description, a.img img, a.visits visits, a.status status, a.password password, a.top top, a.recommend recommend, a.likes likes, a.edit_time editTime, a.create_time, a.modify_time from content a
and a.title like concat('%',#{params.title},'%')
and a.id in ( select b.content_id from category_content b where b.category_id in (select id from category where find_in_set(id,get_category_tree(#{params.categoryId}))) )
order by a.sort
